text: @FLOTUS #BeBeastly put the "medal of freedom" on a man who called a White House child a dog,  called the novel Coronavirus a cold.  Children have needlessly lost their parents due to this administration. Melania, you are no friend to children! #BeBest is impossible for Trumps, get real!!
